Uses of Interface
xxl.core.io.FilesystemOperations

  • Packages that use FilesystemOperations 
    Package Description
    xxl.core.collections.containers.io
    Provides some containers that are able to store their blocks on disk.
    xxl.core.collections.queues.io
    The package xxl.core.collections.queues.io provides some implementations of the queue datastructure using special containers (BlockBasedQueue), files (FileStackQueue) or streams (StreamQueue) for storing and receiving the data.
    xxl.core.io
    Provides classes and routines for system input and output through data streams, serialization, raw i/o and a FAT file system.
    xxl.core.io.fat
    This part is an implementation of the FAT12/16/32-filesystem based on raw access.
    xxl.core.io.raw
    Contains classes and interfaces to access raw devices (disks) directly.

    • Uses of FilesystemOperations in xxl.core.collections.containers.io

      Fields in xxl.core.collections.containers.io declared as FilesystemOperations 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      protected FilesystemOperations BlockFileContainer.fso
      Contains operations for opening, creating, renaming and deleting files.
      Constructors in xxl.core.collections.containers.io with parameters of type FilesystemOperations 
      Constructor and Description
      BlockFileContainer(String prefix, FilesystemOperations fso)
      Constructs a BlockFileContainer that consists of existing files given by the specified file name.
      BlockFileContainer(String prefix, int blockSize, FilesystemOperations fso)
      Constructs an empty BlockFileContainer that is able to store blocks with a maximum size of blockSize bytes.
      MultiBlockContainer(String prefix, FilesystemOperations fso)
      Constructs a MultiBlockContainer that consists of existing files given by the specified file name.
      MultiBlockContainer(String prefix, int blockSize, FilesystemOperations fso)
      Constructs an empty MultiBlockContainer that is able to store blocks with a size larger than blockSize bytes.

    • Uses of FilesystemOperations in xxl.core.collections.queues.io

      Fields in xxl.core.collections.queues.io declared as FilesystemOperations 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      protected FilesystemOperations RandomAccessFileQueue.fso
      Contains an object which is responsible for the operations on files.
      Constructors in xxl.core.collections.queues.io with parameters of type FilesystemOperations 
      Constructor and Description
      RandomAccessFileQueue(String filename, FilesystemOperations fso, Converter<E> converter, Function<?,Integer> inputBufferSize, Function<?,Integer> outputBufferSize)
      Constructs a new random access file queue that stores its elements in the given file.
      RandomAccessFileQueue(String filename, FilesystemOperations fso, Converter<E> converter, Function<?,Integer> inputBufferSize, Function<?,Integer> outputBufferSize, Function<?,? extends InputStream> newInputStream, Function<?,? extends OutputStream> newOutputStream)
      Constructs a new random access file that stores its elements in the given file.

    • Uses of FilesystemOperations in xxl.core.io

      Classes in xxl.core.io that implement FilesystemOperations 
      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      class  JavaFilesystemOperations
      This class implements the interface FilesystemOperations with normal Java method calls.
      class  LogFilesystemOperations
      This class logs all calls to a FilesystemOperations object.
      Fields in xxl.core.io declared as FilesystemOperations 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      static FilesystemOperations JavaFilesystemOperations.DEFAULT_INSTANCE
      The default Java implementation of the FilesystemOperation interface.
      protected FilesystemOperations XXLFilesystem.fso
      Object which allows modifications on files on the file system.
      protected FilesystemOperations LogFilesystemOperations.fso
      FilesystemOperations object to be logged.
      static FilesystemOperations JavaFilesystemOperations.UNBUFFERED_DEFAULT_INSTANCE
      The default Java implementation of the FilesystemOperation interface for unbuffered io.
      Methods in xxl.core.io that return FilesystemOperations 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      FilesystemOperations XXLFilesystem.getFilesystemOperations()
      Returns a FilesystemOperations object which is able to manipulate files.
      Constructors in xxl.core.io with parameters of type FilesystemOperations 
      Constructor and Description
      LogFilesystemOperations(FilesystemOperations fso, PrintStream ps, boolean logOnlyErrors)
      Constructs an object which logs filesystem operations.

      class  FATFilesystemOperations
      This class implements the file system operations for the FAT.

      Classes in xxl.core.io.raw that implement FilesystemOperations 
      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      class  RawAccessArrayFilesystemOperations
      This class provides a simple filesystem based on an array of RawAccesses.
